AccountForecastPeriodMetric.name: AccountForecastPeriodMetric
AccountForecastPeriodMetric.description: Represents records of account metrics which vary by period but are not specific for a product.

AccountForecastId.description: ID of the account forecast record which the period metrics are part of.

AccountGrowthPercentage.description: Expected or projected rate of growth for the account, for that particular forecast period.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

MarketGrowthPercentage.description: Expected or projected rate of growth for the market, for that particular forecast period.

PeriodId.description: ID of the period as derived from the Period entity based on the fiscal year.
